message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $8,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $8,000, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I can offer you a compromise - I'll meet you in the middle at $10,500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,500 is the highest I can go at this point. If you're willing to meet me there, we have a deal.

I'm glad we're close, Bob! However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to get at least $11,000 for the product. Can we meet at $11,000?
